mapper.select: SELECT game.id AS gameId, game.date AS gameDate, game_team.id AS gameTeamId, game_team.score AS gameTeamScore, team.id AS teamId, team.name AS teamName, player.id AS playerId, player.name AS playerName, player.full_name AS playerFullName, player.group_name AS playerGroupName FROM game LEFT JOIN game_team ON game.id=game_team.game_id LEFT JOIN team ON game_team.team_id=team.id LEFT JOIN team_players ON team.id=team_players.team_id LEFT JOIN player ON team_players.player_id=player.id

SELECT game.id AS gameId, game.date AS gameDate, game_team.id AS gameTeamId, game_team.score AS gameTeamScore, team.id AS teamId, team.name AS teamName, player.id AS playerId, player.name AS playerName, player.full_name AS playerFullName, player.group_name AS playerGroupName FROM game LEFT JOIN game_team ON game.id=game_team.game_id LEFT JOIN team ON game_team.team_id=team.id LEFT JOIN team_players ON team.id=team_players.team_id LEFT JOIN player ON team_players.player_id=player.id WHERE game.id = #{gameId}
